src:
V novi številki Primorskih novic preberite
05 Nov 2019, 19:53 by Spletno uredništvo

Končala se je še druga obravnava tožbe, ki jo jenekdanja žena Roberta Časarja Ksenija Sedmak vložila proti Luki Koper. Vztraja, da je v hišo v Portorožu vlagala svoj denar in prihranke, kar je na sodišču potrdil tudi Časar. Na sodišču je med drugim povedal, zakaj je bil umik v Dominikansko republiko napaka.



Časarjeva nekdanja žena v tožbi proti Luki vztraja, da je v hišo v Portorožu vlagala svoj denar in prihranke. Foto: Danijel Cek

Občina Izola v nakup Male opreme?
Na jutrišnji javni dražbi nekdanjega premočenja propadlega Primorja bo sodelovala tudi Občina Izola, ki ima predkupno pravico za zemljišče nekdanje tovarne Mala oprema. Ponudili ga bodo po izklicni ceni 380.000 evrov.
Dogodki na šoli povzročili razkol v italijanski skupnosti
Tik preden je svet javnega zavoda OŠ Dante Alighieri sredi oktobra razrešil dolgoletno ravnateljico Simono Angelini, so v izolskem CAN zamenjali Teuro Raschini, ki je sedela v svetu šole. Zatem so odstopili štirje od devetih članov sveta italijanske skupnosti ...
Brez lovilnih mrež pešpot ostaja nevarna
S klifa je na priljubljeno pešpot med Piranom in Fieso ob zadnjem deževju znova padlo kamenje, kljub sanaciji, med katero so delavci letos poleti s klifa očistili velike skale. Zgodba se bo ponovila, pravijo pristojni, rešitev pa bi prinesle le lovilne mreže.
Stotnija pod eno streho, a se ne čuti krivega
Na koprskem sodišču se je začelo sojenje zaradi fiktivnih začasnih prijav in lažnih zaposlitev. “Ne čutim se krivega,” pravi Miroslav Čeklić iz Gračišča, ki je na svojem domačem naslovu pred leti fiktivno prijavil na desetine Italijanov. Očitke tožilstva zanika tudi Živko Šokčević, ki naj bi z Italijani sklepal fiktivne pogodbe o zaposlitvi.
Prašiče so iz plamenov rešili, hleva pa ne
“Srečo smo imeli, da je hidrantno omrežje zdržalo in da ni bilo močne burje ali vetra, sicer bi imeli res obsežno katastrofo,” je o požaru v Veliki Pristavi povedal vodja gašenja Tadej Smrdel. Plameni so uničili 300 kvadratnih metrov veliko stavbo, iz katere so rešili osem prašičev, v ognju pa so končali številni stroji.
Podjetja bi se selila v Kromberk
Dvanajst podjetij bi se selilo v načrtovano poslovno cono Kromberk vzhod, je pokazal javni poziv mestne občine. “Z odzivom smo zadovoljni, celo prijetno presenečeni,” pravi podžupan Sašo Kogovšek. Na občini upajo, da bodo čim prej pridobili denar EU za gradnjo komunalne infrastrukture.
Kako varno domov z žura, kjer ni javnih prevozov
Kako se na Krasu in širše, kjer ponoči ni javnih prevozov, mladi - varno ali ne - vozijo z žurov domov, je bila tema posveta o prometni varnosti in uporabi alkohola med mladimi, ki so ga pripravili v Sežani, kjer so med drugim izpostavili, da so prometne nesreče najpogostejši vzrok smrti mladih med 15. in 24. letom starosti.
Izglasovali so 28 projektov
Postojnski občani so v okviru participatornega proračuna Moja občina v nedeljo izglasovali 28 projektov, skupno vrednih blizu 200.000 evrov, ki jih bo občina uvrstila v proračuna za leti 2020 in 2021. Na glasovanje je šlo 53 od skupno 122 predlogov občanov. Največ jih je izviselo v mestu. Udeležba je bila šestodstotna.
Vodstvo reprezentance upa, da bo v Istri zavel nov veter
Po svetlem septembru in črnem oktobru je pred slovensko reprezentanco zadnja akcija v kvalifikacijah za evropsko prvenstvo. November bržkone ne bo pomenil prelomnice v tem ciklu, lahko pa bi nakazal razširjen nabor rešitev za prihodnost. To upa tudi selektor Matjaž Kek, ki je objavil seznam nogometašev za dvoboja z Latvijo in Poljsko.
Ko se združita slovenska in ruska kultura
Tretja letošnja predstava SNG Nova Gorica nosi naslov Ôs, podnaslov eksperimentalne predstave pa je Sanje v žanru metafizičnega solipsizma po motivih Milorada Pavića. Gre za predstavo na meji sanjskosti v koprodukciji z ruskim gledališčem Teatr Osobnjak iz Sankt Peterburga v režiji Alekseja Obrazcova. Krstna uprizoritev bo na novogoriškem malem odru jutri in v četrtek ob 20. uri.
text:
Read the new issue of Primorska News
05 Nov 2019, 19:53 by Web Editing

The second hearing of the lawsuit filed by Robert Casar's wife Ksenija Sedmak against Luka Koper has ended. She insists that she has invested her money and savings in a house in Portorož, which was also confirmed by the court. He told the court, among other things, why the withdrawal to the Dominican Republic was a mistake.



In his lawsuit against Luka, Casar's ex-wife insists that she has invested her money and savings in a house in Portorož. Photo: Daniel Cek

Municipality of Izola to buy Small Equipment?
The Municipality of Izola, which has a pre-emptive right for the land of the former Mala oprema factory, will also participate in the public auction of the former fortress of the failed Primorje region tomorrow. It will be offered at a starting price of € 380,000.
Events at school caused a rift in the Italian community
Just before the board of Dante Alighieri, the public institute, dismissed longtime principal Simono Angelini in October, Teura Raschini, who was sitting in the school board, was replaced in CAN. Subsequently, four of the nine members of the Italian Community Council resigned ...
Without fishing nets, footpaths remain dangerous
Rocks fell again on the popular footpath between Piran and Fiesa in the last rain, despite the remediation, during which workers cleared large rocks from the cliff this summer. The story will be repeated, the authorities say, and only fishing nets would come up with a solution.
One hundred under one roof, but not guilty
A trial has begun in the Koper court over fictitious temporary applications and false employment. "I don't feel guilty," says Miroslav Ceklic of Gračišče, who fictitiously reported dozens of Italians to his home address years ago. The prosecution's allegations are also denied by Zivko Sokcevic, who allegedly concluded fictitious employment contracts with the Italians.
The pigs were rescued from the flames but the stable was not
"We were fortunate that the hydrant network withstood and there was no strong storm or wind, otherwise we would have a really extensive disaster," fire chief Tadej Smrdel said about the fire in Velika Pristava. Flames destroyed a 300 square meter large building from which eight pigs were rescued and many machines ended in the fire.
The companies would move to Kromberk
Twelve businesses would be moving to the planned Kromberk East business zone, a public call from the borough showed. "We are pleased with the response, even pleasantly surprised," says Mayor Sašo Kogovšek. The municipality hopes to get EU money to build municipal infrastructure as soon as possible.
How to safely get home from a party with no public transportation
How, in the Karst and beyond, where there is no public transport at night, young people - safely or not - drive from a hurry home, was the topic of a consultation on road safety and alcohol use among young people prepared in Sežana, where they were highlighted, traffic accidents are the most common cause of death for young people between the ages of 15 and 24.
28 projects were voted on
On Sunday, Postojna residents voted for 28 projects totaling close to € 200,000 under the My Municipality participatory budget, which the municipality will include in the 2020 and 2021 budgets. 53 of the 122 citizens' proposals went to vote. Most of them came out in the city. Attendance was six percent.
The national team hopes to see a new wind in Istria
After the bright September and the black October, the last action in the European Championship qualifiers is ahead of the Slovenian national team. November is unlikely to be a turning point in this cycle, but it could indicate an expanded set of solutions for the future. This is also hoped by coach Matjaz Kek, who has published a list of players for duels with Latvia and Poland.
When Slovenian and Russian culture merge
The third performance of this year's SNG Nova Gorica is entitled Ôs, and the subtitle of the experimental performance is The Dream in the Genre of Metaphysical Solipsism, based on Milorad Pavić's motives. It is a performance on the border of dreaming in co-production with the Russian Theater Teatr Osobnjak from St. Petersburg, directed by Alexei Obraztsov. The baptismal performance will take place on the Novorizhian small stage tomorrow and Thursday at 8 pm.
